questions_and_answers.question: What is the purpose of the Photography Club at NMAM Institute of Technology?
questions_and_answers.answer:
The Photography Club at NMAM Institute of Technology focuses on organizing photography-related activities and events.
For Further Information, visit: https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/non-technical-clubs.php

questions_and_answers.question: Which club at NMAM Institute of Technology is responsible for event management?
questions_and_answers.answer:
The Event Management Club, known as Thorana, is responsible for organizing and managing events at NMAM Institute of Technology.

questions_and_answers.question: What is the main focus of the Dance Club at NMAM Institute of Technology?
questions_and_answers.answer:

questions_and_answers.question: How does the club Aura & Hands of Hope contribute to the community at NMAM Institute of Technology?
